mapper.insert: insert into member(mem_email, mem_pw, mem_nick, mem_avt, mem_reg_date, mem_intro, mem_auth_pending, mem_auth_key) values(#{mem_email},#{mem_pw},#{mem_nick},#{mem_avt},#{mem_reg_date},#{mem_intro},#{mem_auth_pending},#{mem_auth_key})
mapper.update: update member set mem_pw = #{mem_pw}, mem_nick = #{mem_nick}, mem_avt = #{mem_avt}, mem_intro =#{mem_intro} where mem_no = #{mem_no}
mapper.select: select * from member where mem_no > 0 order by mem_no desc, mem_reg_date desc
